unnormalised: Arre, IMD mhanta ki 15/06/2024 haka 40°C punha astaa? Distaa ki konne monsoonak sangpak visarle ki July 1 hi ek suchovna nhoi, ti ek antim tarikh!
normalised: Arre, I-M-D mhonta ki pondhra june don hazar ani tevisacher challis degree celsius portun asta? Dista konnen tori monsoonak sangonk visorlem ki July poilo ek suchovna nhoi, ti ek akhri tarik!
text: Arre, IMD mhanta ki 15/06/2024 haka 40°C punha astaa? Distaa ki konne monsoonak sangpak visarle ki July 1 hi ek suchovna nhoi, ti ek antim tarikh!
